channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Should AI Agents Carry Identity Cards?
item.description: IT vendors in the identity access managemnet (IAM) space have always been keen to underline the fact that machines (like dogs) are people too.
